en.title: Improve Text with AI
en.description: Improve your text writing with AI

seo.whatIsContent: **AI Text Improvement** uses **Chrome's Rewriter API** or **Google Gemini** to enhance your writing. Fix grammar, improve clarity, adjust tone, and make text more professional or concise automatically.
seo.howToTitle: How to improve text with AI?
howToSteps: Select **improvement mode**: Grammar, Clarity, Professional, Casual, or Concise

faq.question: Is text improvement free?
faq.answer: Yes! It uses **Chrome's local Rewriter API** (free, offline) when available, or falls back to **Google Gemini** (requires free API key).

faq.question: What improvement modes are available?
faq.answer: Offers **5 modes**: Fix Grammar, Improve Clarity, Make Professional, Make Casual, and Make Concise. Each optimized for different writing needs.

faq.question: Does it change the meaning?
faq.answer: No, it preserves the **original meaning** while improving grammar, clarity, and style. You always have control over the final text.
